entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then northwest 20 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
